About me

Hi there!

My name is Kailey and I'm a Web Developer. I'm passionate about challenging myself, problem solving, and I am a lifelong learner. I have a Associate's degree in General Studies, a Bachelor's degree in Media Arts and Sciences with a concentration in Web Development and Web Design, and currently, I'm working towards my Master's degree in Software Development.

I'm most experienced working with HTML, CSS, SASS, Node.js, Git, TypeScript, PHP, JavaScript, React, WordPress, SQL, technical writing, Adobe XD, Adobe Illustrator, and Adobe Photoshop.

When I'm not developing, I enjoy being outside, exploring downtown Indianapolis, enjoying the sunshine, staying active by running, swimming, or playing volleyball. I also enjoy reading literary nonfiction and writing programming related articles. When I can, I love to travel to new places.

Blog

Projects

Covid Tracker

A responsive web app that displays real time data on the number of cases, recoveries, and deaths worldwide and specific to each country. This app was built using HTML, CSS, SASS, JS, NPM, REACT.js, Disease.sh API, and Firebase.

Live Demo Source Code

Budgety

A JavaScript CRUD application that lets a user manage their budget for the month by adding income and subtracting expenses. It was created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

See Live Source Code

React Spotify Clone

A dynamic React App that replicates the Spotify Web App UI and some functionalities, such as play and skip. It was created using the Spotify API, Material UI, React Context API, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and NPM.

Source Code

Insure

A dynamic solution to a Frontend Mentor coding challenge that displays the home page for an insurance company. It was created using HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, Node.js, and NPM.

See Live Source Code

EDRL - ENGINEERING DESIGN RESEARCH LAB

A informational website designed and developed for the Purdue School of Engineering & Technology using Adobe XD, HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript, PHP, Node.js, and NPM.

Source Code
